CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable notifications when price alarm is tripped (widget needs to be active)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Price Alarm

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Vibrate when price alarm is tripped
Play a sound when price alarm is tripped

RingtonePreference.android:summary: Pick the sound to be played
RingtonePreference.android:title: Select Sound

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Uses android built-in Alarm Clock. *Caution*: Will override silent/vibration modes and keep ringing until shut off.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: *Hardcore Mode*

PreferenceCategory.android:summary: Enter values where you want to be notified. Please enter valid numbers. Default Low:0, High:999
PreferenceCategory.android:title: Alarm Settings

Preference.android:summary: Please enter UNSCALED values\nFor example, enter BTC not mBTC
